root: ^Strange guy: What are you doing here? Can't believe someone would come to this place.

ASK: ^And who are you? Are you okay?
^Strange guy: No, I'm not. But it's fine, I got injured by these creatures, these wounds aren't serious though, I just need to rest a bit.
^Strange guy: I'm a Wanderer, just like you. I came here to collect something important from the bastard you are going to fight.
HOW: ^How come you know why I'm here?
^Strange guy: Hmm? Just my gut feeling, what else made you come here anyway.
^Strange guy: Stop being a worrywart, don't you have things to do? Be on your way then, don't worry about me.
WHAT: ^What is it that you want to collect?
^Strange guy: It's a secret. When you finish him I will be there to do my part.
^Strange guy: I believe you can beat him with ease haha
